location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, to George Skipp, at Shiraz

mods.abstract: The letter discusses the rent situation in Bushire and the long-standing disagreement with Shaik Nassir [Sheikh NƒÅsir] who demands more from the Company. Skipp is urged to try and settle the issue with the Sheikh during his talks in Shiraz.
